data.actual_result: Expected context menu does not popup System Settings: Win10 x64, Discord Canary
data.expected_result: Context menu for text manipulation popups [(Copy, Cut, )Paste]
data.short_description: Right clicking search bar for messages does not show text manipulation context menu
